bug.author: wooksong
bug.summary: [Meson] Fix build break of meson on launchpad/nnstreamer
bug.description:
This is a sub-issue of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1440>#1440</denchmark-link> .
If it is simple to create debian package for meson 0.50.1, I will write new my own debian-packaging related files for it. Otherwise, 1) Just skip some failed tests or 2) choose other ways to fix the build break easily will be done.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1461>#1461</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1461>#1461</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
@nnsuite/nnstreamer Build breaks on <denchmark-link:https://code.launchpad.net/~nnstreamer/+recipe/nnstreamer-daily>our PPA</denchmark-link> have been just fixed. We can close this issue.
